name: hover_and_capture
title: Hover to reveal UI then capture
description: Move the mouse to a target location to reveal hover state, then capture evidence.

arguments.name: duration
arguments.description: Seconds to animate the move (0 for instant)

arguments.name: goal
arguments.description: What you want to inspect with the hover state

content.text: Goal: {{goal}}. Move the cursor with `move_mouse` to ({{x}}, {{y}}) using duration={{duration}} when provided. Avoid clicking. After the hover settles, call `take_screenshot` (output_path={{output_path}} when provided) so the hover state is captured. Return the screenshot path, any warnings, and a brief note on whether the target UI reacted.
